participant_1.name: Marco Rossi
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and open-minded, Marco enjoys sharing his passions with others and is always ready to introduce friends to new experiences.
participant_1.background: My parents were immigrants from Italy. I listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress. Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab. I have a wide range of musical tastes and enjoy listening to different genres depending on my mood. I love soccer.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Determined and ambitious, Emily is a multi-tasker who takes pride in her work and enjoys embracing new challenges.
participant_2.background: I'm proud of my ability to juggle my many roles and responsibilities. I am an American citizen. My favorite car is the Ford Mustang. I take pride in my job managing the restaurant. I am deathly terrified of heights.

content.text: Hi there! I hope you're having a nice day.
Hey, thanks! I'm doing well. How about you?
I'm doing good! I'm just hanging out and listening to music.
Cool, what kind of music do you like?
I like a little bit of everything, but I'm really into indie music right now.
I've never really been into indie music, but I'm always willing to give new things a try.
Well, if you're ever in the mood to listen to some, I'd be happy to share some of my favorites with you.
That sounds like fun! I'm always up for trying new things.
Awesome! My favorite band right now is The Japanese House. They're a really cool indie pop band from the UK.
I'll have to check them out! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
You should! They're really good. I also like Pale Waves, The Japanese House, and Wolf Alice.
I've actually heard of Wolf Alice before! I'll have to check out the other two.
Awesome! Let me know what you think!
